aboutUs.title: About Reactiverse
aboutUs.description: Empowering designers and developers to share, discover, and implement stunning UI components.
aboutUs.missionContentP1: At Reactiverse, our mission is to foster a vibrant community where creativity thrives. We provide a platform for UI/UX designers and front-end developers to showcase their innovative components, share knowledge, and inspire one another. We believe in the power of open collaboration to push the boundaries of web design and development.
aboutUs.missionContentP2: Whether you're looking for inspiration, ready-to-use code snippets, or a place to share your own masterpieces, Reactiverse is your go-to destination.

offerItems.title: Diverse Component Showcase
offerItems.description: Explore a vast collection of UI components, from simple buttons to complex interactive elements.

offerItems.title: Inspiration Hub
offerItems.description: Discover new design trends, techniques, and get inspired by the work of talented creators.

offerItems.title: Community Driven
offerItems.description: Connect with fellow designers, share feedback, and contribute to a growing ecosystem of creativity.

aboutUs.joinContent: Reactiverse is more than just a platform; it's a community. We invite you to join us, share your work, learn from others, and help build the future of UI design.

support.title: Support Center
support.description: Need help? We're here for you. Find answers or get in touch with our support team.
support.emailSupportDescription: Get in touch via email for any inquiries.
support.forumDescription: Ask questions and find answers in our community.
support.faqPlaceholder: Our FAQ section is under construction. Please check back later for common questions and answers!

guidelines.title: Design Guidelines
guidelines.description: Our principles and best practices for submitting designs to Reactiverse.
guidelines.mainPlaceholderContent: We are currently drafting our comprehensive design guidelines to ensure quality and consistency. Please check back soon for details on how to prepare your submissions.

topDesigners.title: Top Designers
topDesigners.description: Meet the most influential and creative designers on Reactiverse.
topDesigners.mainPlaceholderContent: We're currently curating our list of top designers. Check back soon to see who's leading the pack in creativity and innovation!

founder.name: Avik Samanta
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.bio:
Cybersecurity Engineer | Blockchain Specialist | Bug Bounty Hunter.
Skilled in vulnerability research, ethical hacking, and securing digital infrastructures. Passionate about advancing blockchain security, identifying threats, and building innovative security solutions.

coFounder.name: Anusha Gupta
coFounder.title: Founder & CEO
coFounder.bio:
Software Developer | AI Web Developer | Cybersecurity Enthusiast.
Skilled in software and web development, AI integration, Python automation, and secure application design. Focused on leveraging machine learning and vulnerability research to create innovative, secure solutions.
